Title: Enacts the "licensed funeral arranger act"
Summary: Enacts the "licensed funeral arranger act" under which a "licensed funeral arranger" license allows a funeral arranger to perform all acts permitted to a funeral director except embalming or any preservation of the body of a deceased person requiring embalming; creates a registration process under which registered transporters facilitate the removal and transportation of the bodies of deceased persons.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to enacting the "licensed funeral arranger act"
